thunder/mine (weapon)/(Internet slang) terrifying/terrific

sentences.english: It was rebuilt by steel structure.

sentences.english: The most two famous folklores are Leifeng Tower and Xileng Bridge.
sentences.chinese: 最著名的两个是雷峰塔和西冷峭的故事。
